sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for operating the Gas Chromatography system.
sections.scope: Applicable to analysis of volatile compounds in Pharmaceutical Analysis laboratory.
procedure: Switch ON the gas supply and GC system.
Set oven temperature and detector parameters.
Prepare and inject the sample using microsyringe.
Analyze retention times and peak areas.
After analysis, shut down the system as per guidelines.
sections.precautions: Ensure proper gas flow. Handle syringes carefully to avoid injury.
